Text: Todu Zayo̩n oñ omi ma achechi n,
Tak abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ali o̩kpakpa-we̩,
Uwe̩ lʼachʼike̩be̩ alifia ef o̩wo̩ Jihofa
Ma ñʼadʼuwe̩ kʼE̩ne̩ ku ma hiu tinyo̩ ge̩ n,
Todu alu kʼokolobia anʼonobule̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n chʼo̩ya, abe̩le̩ amo̩ma-we̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ anʼuwe̩ chʼo̩ya,
Omi kʼabide jo̩ oj aku aku-we̩,
me̩ ki la je̩ ñw u ñmi n,
Jihofa fʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ kpai o̩wo̩ ukpahiu-wñ go̩ kakini:
chai abo ku ma ko wʼunyi aje̩,
Lale, lale gu ef alaku du,
Ma ado̩ ma ko̩, Abo Kiafo̩,
